message: Hello Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll really like. I'm willing to let you have it for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but $120 is a bit high for me. I'd be willing to pay $90 for it.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, so I'm going to counteroffer at $105.
I appreciate the compromise, but $105 is still a bit out of my budget. I'd be willing to pay $95 for the product.
I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession, so I'll counteroffer at $100. This is as low as I'm willing to go.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, I'm still a bit short on budget. I'd be willing to pay $92 for the product.
I'm starting to think we're getting close to a deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $97.50, but that's as low as I'm willing to go.
I'm getting close to accepting, but I'm still a bit short. I'd be willing to pay $92.50 for the product.
I'm not willing to go much lower than that, Bob. I'll meet you at $94.50, but that's my final offer.
I'm sorry, but I think we're getting too close to the original price. I'm going to have to pass on this deal. I'll just go with John for $80.
